name: Bold Contrast
description: Bold colors with high contrast for maximum visual impact. Ideal for landing pages, marketing sites, and applications requiring strong visual presence.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Make a statement. Bold typography, vibrant colors, and strong visual hierarchy demand attention. Perfect for brands that want to stand out.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Vibrant magenta primary creates energy and excitement. Use contrasting colors for visual pop. Dark backgrounds with bright accents for drama.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Large, confident buttons and headings. Bold hover states with scale or color shifts. Use shadows and elevation for depth.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: High contrast meets accessibility requirements naturally. Ensure color is not the only indicator of state. Test with color blindness simulators.
